duties_responsibilities.duty: Troubleshoot and repair medical devices, ensuring accurate documentation of activities.
Perform preventive maintenance on medical devices as required by the customer, including installation and implementation of new devices.
Conduct routine system checks, record data from product tests, and maintain stock of parts and tools assigned by the customer.
Be available 24/7 for on-call support, including travel locally to customer locations and lifting up to 50 pounds.
Comply with client requirements for on-site services, including vaccination compliance and using appropriate PPE.

education_certification.credential: Active and unrestricted driver's license is required.
Experience in healthcare, field service, engineering, biomedical, or technical field is beneficial.
Comfort with lifting up to 50 pounds and using basic software programs.
Compliance with client requirements for on-site work, including vaccination compliance.
